<title level="1" pfs="">[Venexus's Chosen](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1788)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 27

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Venexus's Chosen](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1788)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 55</row>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 115

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 5

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 5

**Tail Lash** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of the chosen's tail Strike uses an action to Strike or attempt a skill check** **Effect** Venexus's chosen attempts to Strike the triggering creature with their tail. If it hits, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the triggering roll.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +16 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 bludgeoning plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20).

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 24, attack +16
- **3rd**
[Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245) (at will)

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" />  ([concentrate](/Actions.aspx?ID=683), [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Venexus's chosen changes between their humanoid shape and hybrid shape. They gain a tail unarmed Strike while in their hybrid shape.

**Flurry of Blows** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Venexus's chosen makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Ice Walk**   Venexus's chosen ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and doesn't risk falling when crossing ice.

**Powerful Fists**   Venexus's chosen's fist Strikes are treated as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) and [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379), and the chosen doesn't take penalties when making lethal attacks.

</column>
name: Venexus's Chosen

If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Ice Walk Venexus's chosen ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and doesn't risk falling when crossing ice. Powerful Fists Venexus's chosen's fist Strikes are treated as cold iron and silver, and the chosen doesn't take penalties when making lethal attacks.
